author: Rory D. Sheriff
text: What I do know is that @willsmith and @chrisrock are both men of their own conviction. We as black America feel the much deeper pain of it all. The good thing is It'll work out. It always does.

text: Just processing the joke vs the smack. At the end of the day our celebrities are human. I pray for resolve @willsmith @chrisrock #Oscars2022

author: Rory D. Sheriff
text:
BNS Productions partnered with The Levine Museum of the New South to present a Juneteenth virtual family day. 

We will feature 3 original short plays/readings written by Rory Sheriff  plus Dancing and Singing. 

Streaming begins at noon June 18th Levine Museum of the New South https://t.co/8eHOiihYgw
